metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: The move_uploaded_file() function moves an uploaded file to a new destination.
content.html: The move_uploaded_file() function moves an uploaded file to a new destination.

content.text: Note: This function only works on files uploaded via PHP's HTTP POST upload mechanism.
content.html: Note: This function only works on files uploaded via PHP's HTTP POST upload mechanism.

content.text: Note: If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.
content.html: Note: If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.

content.code_html:
Parameter Description
file Required. Specifies the filename of the uploaded file
dest Required. Specifies the new location for the file
